Class Dice

java.lang.Object
utils.Dice
public class Dice extends Object
Utility class for simulating dice rolls in the U-Energy RPG game.

The Dice class provides a method to roll a specified number of dice with a given number of faces, returning the total result.

  • Method Details

    • roll

      public static int roll(int amount, int faces)
      Rolls a number of dice and returns the total sum.

      Each die produces a random value between 1 and faces, inclusive.

      Parameters:
      amount - the number of dice to roll
      faces - the number of faces on each die
      Returns:
      the total sum of all dice rolls
